name: Mountain View
description:
Controls

A - Paddle left

D - Paddle right

Space - Enjoy the view

Press space to view the mountian.

This game had grand ambitions to be an adventure where you explore locations and search for your family..... but it turned into a short row across a bay. I might make a grand adventure out of it but for now enjoy the view.

(Don't play it in fullscreen. There's no button to exit. You'll have to manually close it)
